title: World Bank and post WWII global economy

content.question: After the Second World War, countries around the world did which of the following to restore the global economy?

choices.label: Created the European Union to coordinate European economic aid to former colonies.
Developed a common economic aid package for African and Asian states.
Established new financial institutions, such as the World Bank.
Allowed the United Nations to take over failing national economies.

content.answer: Established new financial institutions, such as the World Bank.
